name: places/ChIJZfP5Vif2wokRramgU6V7NQc
formattedAddress: 27 W 96th St #16F, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 27 W 96th St #16F, New York, NY 10025-6592, USA

originalText.text:
I started using NYC Dog Walkers in August 2023 after I broke my ankle and wasn’t able to take my dogs for a walk. I’m not sure if you’ve ever had an injury that caused you to be non-weight bearing, but it can be very stressful. Our dog walker (Lisa), gave my dogs the ability to enjoy daily walks, something I was unable to do. They were so excited every time she walked through the door, so much that they even came to learn the phrase, “Lisa is coming”!

Paul (the owner) is very quick to respond to requests, and it is evident that his company prioritizes its clients and their satisfaction.

I highly recommend NYC Dog Walkers. My dogs have made a lifelong friend- thank you Lisa!!

originalText.text: We’ve been using NYC Dog Walkers for a couple of years now and have had a positive experience. Our dog walker is professional and reliable, and our dog is always happy to see her. The company is clear about their policies, and responsive to emails. I’m writing this review today because this morning as I was leaving a note for the dog walker about some things happening with our dog this month, it occurred to me how lucky we are to have no worries about who our dog goes out with during the day.

text.text: We’ve been using NYC Dog Walkers for a couple of years now and have had a positive experience. Our dog walker is professional and reliable, and our dog is always happy to see her. The company is clear about their policies, and responsive to emails. originalText.text: I recently moved out of state and can no longer use NYCDW. I've been using NYCDW for over 15yrs. (Paul is the best owner/operator!) My first dog Sasha was a client and loved all of her dog walkers.  Bella (my current dog,) has been a client since she was 2 months old.  Since I work full time I trusted NYCDW to potty train her, walk on a leash, and be a friendly addition to the neighborhood.  Lisa, her walker is the best.  Bella is still looking for her everyday to take her on walks.  Lisa is trustworthy and had full access to my home.  If you are searching for a dog walking service you should absolutely call NYCDW, they are the best and I'll miss them. Bella sends you both hugs and kisses!

originalText.text: I’ve been using NYC Dog Walkers for over a year. My dog loves his walks with Aaron and always comes home happy! The service has always been professional and efficient with scheduling and payment.

text.text: I’ve been using NYC Dog Walkers for over a year. My dog loves his walks with Aaron and always comes home happy! The service has always been professional and efficient with scheduling and payment.

originalText.text: We loved working with NYC Dog Walkers while we lived in the city. It was recommended by a friend in our building and it did not disappoint. Paul was very communicative and responsive, while the dog walkers (especially Lisa) were so responsible, timely and loving to our dog. Highly recommend! Great prices as well!
